pr_title: Introduce value objects for meta data

timeline.message:
Introduce value objects for meta data

Added value objects to represent common meta data instead of using a
generic map.

Signed-off-by: Kai Hudalla <kai.hudalla@bosch.io>

timeline.bodyText: I think when it comes to coordinates, there should be a very explicit definition of what the coordinate system is.
timeline.author: ctron

timeline.bodyText: I would say, things like this belong into an enum.
timeline.author: ctron

replies.bodyText: In general, I agree. However, I haven't found a (formal) definition of these channel IDs and I suspect that they are specific to each provider (if used at all). We could define a private enum but is that worth the effort?
replies.author: sophokles73

replies.bodyText: Ok, in that case leaving it as is makes sense.
replies.author: ctron

timeline.message:
Add JavaDocs indicating measurement units and property semantics

Add JavaDocs with measurement units to GatewayInfo

Signed-off-by: Kai Hudalla <kai.hudalla@bosch.io>
